searchableProductInfo.details: Lipstick-red leather (Calf)Chain shoulder strapDesigner plaque at fold-over flap, gold hardwareInternal pouch pocketFully lined in stone suedeMagnetic snap-fastening front flapDesigner color: New Raspberry
searchableProductInfo.title: 1973 leather shoulder bag
searchableProductInfo.editorsNotes: Gucci's '1973' collection saw Frida Giannini put her signature sleek spin on retro-inspired designs, and this miniature shoulder bag is a fashion-forward take on a classic. Beautifully crafted from lipstick-red leather with gold hardware, this petite piece will add a pop of color to after-dark looks. Wear it with a monochrome dress and eclectic gems to work contemporary cocktail style.Shown here with: Jason Wu dress, Eddie Borgo ring, Yves Saint Laurent ring, Acne belt, Miu Miu shoes.
